headline: Modernizing Mortgage Delivery: Regions Bank Names Drew Chuba to Lead Home Loan Direct Team
summary: BIRMINGHAM, Ala., February 27, 2025--Regions Bank on Thursday announced Drew Chuba has joined Regions Mortgage as senior vice president, Home Loan Direct centralized sales and enablement manager.
